H0.text: Once every 12 hours is how often Earth rotates on its axis.

H1.text: Once every 24 hours is how often Earth rotates on its axis.

H2.text: Once every month is how often Earth rotates on its axis.

H3.text: Once every year is how often Earth rotates on its axis.

A4.text: Earth rotates once in about 24 hours with respect to the Sun.
